Articles.Content:
Hello. As suggested, here it is

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Yes, so. 79 tons able to land. With full warranty as well*!

Sorry, not good at explaining. If you have any questions, please ask

*Warranty void if you launch into space

Love the kerbal inspired warranty, is the distance between the payload and the ground safe enough to drop onto a high gravity planet/body without damaging the legs of the payload?

Have you thought about how a launcher will connect to this crane and its payload so they can safely leave kerbin SOI?

How is the payload connected?

Payload is connected through a mini decoupler with a few struts.

With this payload, attach a decoupler to the bottom, then boom. Launcher added

AS long as you land softly, don't worry about the payload gear. I dropped this on Minmus and didn't damage much.
